featured.text: They learn a lot from great people’s quotes.
Z: I would put success in quotes.
Why does the author quote Blixen’s comment at the end of the third paragraph? (A)

definition.zh_def: 引用，特別是從書籍、文章或演講中提取的文字或話語。
definition.en_def: A repetition of someone else's statement or thoughts, typically with attribution.
definition.example: She decided to quote a famous author in her essay.
